page.title: 12SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content: {RESIDENCES}There are quite a few Senior Citizens residences in the Speke and Hale area. There are three in Speke and one in Hale. In Speke in {Clough Road, West Mains}and one by{St {Ambrose Church.} Old persons go into these residences because they cannot do everything for themselves, and so that they are able to help each other, it is company, and helps to form a community for them. In these residences both men and women live there and have most of their meals provided for them, which they can eat in the dining room or in their flats. Most of these people are over 60 years old, and have free bus pass. {AMENITIES}They are provided with a day Centre which is at the end of one of the buildings and contains easychairs so that they can talk, play cards or dominos or watch the television.
